684729784.name: Stamina Enhancement
684729784.description: Increases all Helldivers' stamina capacity and recovery.

876985512.name: Localization Confusion
876985512.description: Increases the time between enemy encounters.

1110686504.name: Vitality Enhancement
1110686504.description: Allows all Helldivers to resist injury.

1908198785.name: Hellpod Space Optimization
1908198785.description: Helldivers come out of the Hellpod fully stocked on Ammo, Grenades, and Stims.

2776452811.name: Muscle Enhancement
2776452811.description: Allows Helldivers to traverse difficult terrain with ease.

4066886572.name: Increased Reinforcement Budget
4066886572.description: Increases the number of available reinforcements.

4136928865.name: UAV Recon Booster
4136928865.description: Increases all Helldivers' effective radar range.

4273318008.name: Flexible Reinforcement Budget
4273318008.description: Reduces time until new reinforcements are granted once they've been depleted.

3504405746.name: Expert Extraction Pilot
3504405746.description: Lowers the time it takes for the extraction shuttle to reach the extraction beacon.

2709264466.name: Motivational Shocks
2709264466.description: Allows all Helldivers to recover faster after being slowed by an attack, such as acid. Does not mitigate 'area effects,' such as EMS Strikes.

3912131454.name: Experimental Infusion
3912131454.description: Temp Desc: Stims boost movement speed and reduced incoming damage for short period

3102833400.name: Firebomb Hellpods
3102833400.description: Lines all Hellpods with volatile incendiaries that detonate upon impact, igniting any units in vicinity of the drop site.

2239116615.name: Dead Sprint
2239116615.description: Allows Helldivers to keep sprinting even when they are out of stamina, draining their health instead.
